haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry

Class SensorEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry.ScriptEntry
      • haw.livingplace.scriptSimulator.script.entry.SensorEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scriptable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Scriptable>, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemperaturSensorEntry

    public class SensorEntry
extends ScriptEntry
    Parentclass for all sensortypes possible in the wireless sensornetwork of Alexander Pautz. http://livingplace.informatik.haw-hamburg.de/wiki/index.php/Drahtloses_Sensornetzwerk
    Author:
    Andreas Basener
    See Also:
    ScriptEntry, Serialized Form
